taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section flagellares;species indianensis;

treatment.description: Slender, the short-prickly canes 2-3 mm. in diameter; primocane-leaves 3-foliolate, the glabrous or glabrescent oval short-acuminate leaflets coarsely dentate-serrate; flowering shoots and petioles spreading-villous; flowers 1-4 on arched ascending or divergent glandular and villous pedicels 1.5-2.5 cm. long; foliaceous bracts overtopping pedicels.
